reviewText: I think Amazon needs to investigate why all the reviews either are 5 stars or 1 star - statisticaly, this is a highly abnormal distribution curve.  My theory is that the cast, crew and whoever shelled out the $3,000 to finance this crap are writing themselves good reviews.  This theory is furthered by the fact that all the crap movies poduced this same company (I got suckered into buying several different movies by this film company by the "good" reviews) all have numerous 5 star ratings or 1 star ratings.DO NOT BUY THIS MOVIE.  It is absolutely pathetic.  A highschool drama club could produce a better movie.  It looks like it was shot using a Best Buy 70% off discontinued Camcorder.  The lighting is terrible, and there are absolutely no, no, no production values.  I can not iterate how bad this movie looks.Now, on the acting.  The cast in this movie shouldn't even be able to get work as extras, much less as actual actors.  I rather watch funny pet videos on youtube for an hour and a half than watch these people act, and I hate funny pet videos.  The acting in this movie is so bad, I don't think you could even really call it acting.I still can't believe I bought this movie.  DO NOT BUY THIS!  The 5 star reviews are fake!  This movie sucks!
summary: Good reviews must be from cast and crew

reviewText: I waited 3 weeks to get this because of the positive reviews.Slasherpool and horror review even said it was cool.I could hardly finish it to be honest.There was maybe one person who could halfway act and the rest were pretty weak.The killing scenes were weak as well and half the time they just cut away to another scene completely.I have been watching horror movies for years and this one just doesn't do it for me.This is listed as the world's first basher movie.I could bash myself over the head for buying it.

reviewText: You got me! Again! Silly amazon reviewers with your lies and deceit... I fell for it. I bought it. I always like trying new movies especially indie movies because I've actually found 2 or 3 that were amazing and I got to show them off to all my friends. But this was just complete rubbish. I have a collection of fairly crappy movies that I've acquired, but this one went into the trash. I'll never watch it again, and I hope I forget about it in the near future. The acting was horrible and the story was even worse. Want a Michael Myers ripoff?? Here you go! 1/4 star for trying.
Title: N/A

reviewText: ***SPOILIERS***I'm serious!  I don't understand the jealous hatred some "reviewers" post about this film.  I guess it's true. Those who can't do, BASH!  Speaking of "bash", METHODIC has the distinction of being the very first "basher" film!Anyway, sure there's a similarity to HALLOWEEN, but director Chris .R. Notarile freely admits his love of that film and that METHODIC was originally intended as a reboot / remake of the John Carpenter classic.All that aside, METHODIC starts out on failiar ground with a small boy who kills his parents, but quickly developes into it's own interesting and original story where we learn that the entity known as "The Dollman" is more like a virus than a spirit so anyone can't become The Dollman.  This theme is explored more in the short sequel METHODIC 1.5 and that film shows where the storyline is going and it has nothing to do with HALLOWEEN !!As for the acting, Brandon Slagle, Niki Notarile, Tony Dadika and Stephen Muzzonigro completely nail their roles and the supporting cast is equally as good with standouts being Daniel Werzinger, Rachael Robbins and Roberto Lombardi (who's storyline features heavily in METHODIC 1.5 and the upcoming METHODIC II).Visually, METHODIC is stark and disturbing in all the right places and the music really enhances the visuals. Pick this up if you like old school horror with a good story.  If you're into body count movies about drunk teens, pass on this!
summary: METHODIC is so good it should be in theaters!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I've got to side with the reviewers who found this film awful. The plot is derivative of "Halloween," the acting is weak, the technical elements (cinematography, lighting, sound, storytelling, etc.) are amateurish, and the final product is completely lacking in tension or even cheap scares.There are a lot of successful low-budget horror films out there, but this is not at all one of them. It's barely even Mystery Science Theater 3000-level fodder.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Were all the people who gave this movie 4&5 stars in the movie? Seriously! I like my horror movies as much as the next guy, but this wasn't even worth watching to the end! I've seen reviews before where people gave 5 star ratings only because they were in the movie itself! Not sure if this is the case but, maybe they're relatives or friends of the movie. I'm not that picky about movies but I don't think this even qualifies as a "B" movie. As you can imagine I was very disappointed in this movie that had gotten such high praise. I would strongly recomend only renting this movie at the video store only, for sure!
summary: Who wrote all these great reviews?!!!

reviewText: First off i dont know how this TERRIBLE,HORRIBLE movie got 5 stars from anyone.like the title of this reveiw says the best thing about this whole movie is the killers mask looks cool,lots of T&A shots and a very nice lesbo scene.Other then those points of interest this movie is utter garbage.i saw it with 2 other people and we were so bored we had to fast forward through it to see if it ever got interesting....it never did.The kills were boring and not even the slightest bit gory,the acting was horrible and the movie itself looks like it was shot on a camcorder.stay away,[...].If you buy it youll regret it....heck I regret ever seeing it.
summary: The best thing about this movie is the mask

reviewText: OK, THE TITLE OF THIS MOVIE IS GOOD, BUT AFTER SEEING THIS MOVIE THE EXCITEMENT QUICKLY PLUMMETS, THIS MOVIE WAS JUST PLANE AWFUL.  FIRST THING ABOUT PRODUCTION IS LIGHTING AND SOUND. WHOEVER PRODUCED THIS FILM NEEDS TO TAKE SOME CLASSES ON HOW TO LIGHT AND MIC YOUR PEOPLE. VISIT VICTOR PRODUCTIONS AND LOOK AT HOW IT IS DONE. THE ACTING WAS ATROCIOUS, THE LESBIAN SEEN HAD POTENTIAL, BUT THE POOR EXECUTION OF THE SHOTS JUST RUINED IT FOR ME. IT LOOKED LIEK IT WAS SHOT ON A CAMCORDER OR SOMETHING....TO BE HONEST, THERE SHOULD BE A LAW IN PLACE THAT FILM MAKERS CANNOT DEFINE THEIR MOVIE AS FILM UNLESS IT IS SHOT ON 16MM OR 35MM. IF YOU USED A RED CAMERA WHICH WE HAVE DONE, AT LEAST IT WOULD LOOK LIKE A HIGH QUALITY MOVIE. I WASTED MY MONEY ON 6 FILMS THIS YEAR. BLEED WITH ME, PROMISE, HATCHET, DRAGGED TO HELL,  FRIDAY THE 13TH(REMAKE), AND LASTLY METHODIC. REMAKES SUCK, BUT LETS NO TOCUH UP THAT SUBJECT. METHODIC HAS AN UNORIGINAL CONCEPT WHICH IS TRIES TO ASPIRE TO HALLOWEEN WHICH JOHN CARPENTER WOULD BE VERY EMBARRASSED AND HUMILIATED IF HE KNEW THE PRODUCER/DIRECTOR OF THIS VIDEO WAS TRYING TO ACHIEVE. THANK GOD JOHN WOULD NOT READ THIS COMMENT BECAUSE HE WOULD BE VERY ANGRY WITH SHAME. I DID LIKE ONE THING ABOUT THIS VIDEO, AND THAT IS, YOU NEVER KNOW HOW GOOD BLEED WITH ME IS UNTIL YOU WATCH METHODIC...SO I MAY KEEP BLEED WITH ME AFTER ALL!BELOW ARE SOME GOOD PICKS I RECOMMEND IN THE INDEPENDENT LEAGUE...HANGLER(SCARY AS HELL+)(NOT FOR ALL AUDIENCES -)LAID TO REST(INCREDIBLE SPECIAL EFFECTS+)(SOME OF THE ACTING WAS NOT GOOD-)LAST HOUSE ON THE LEFT(GRAPHIC SEX SCENE+)(THE SEX SCENE WAS TOO REALISTIC WHICH SCARES SOME PEOPLE-)MENTAL SCARS(GREAT KILLER AND SOUND/SCORE+)(SOME OF THE ACTORS IN THE JUNKYARD WERE NOT GOOD-)TRICK OR TREAT(LITTLE BOY MONSTER+)(CONFUSING STORY-)BEYOND REMEDY(GREAT SPECIAL EFFECTS)( STORY COULD HAVE BEEN MORE ORIGINAL-)
summary: THIS IS A VIDEO--NOT A MOVIE!
